overview: Classic Crash has found himself unpopular in a very long time. with his threat of sending over the time-twister to Earth, Bash and his friends, along with new faces during their adventure must help by going back in time to stop old problems from happening and have a celebration in the end. However, will Bash be able to stop Classic Crash from warping him back into an old timeline?
title: The Bash Candicoot Movie
